description:
Zoro`s escape attempt is thwarted by a gang of sword-slinging baboon bullies, and Brook uses music to end a feud between irate islanders with unequal arms!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Encounter! The Great Swordsman Mihawk! Zoro`s Self-Willed Deadly Struggle!
Sesshoku! Daikengou Mihawk: Zoro Iji no Shitou
Un contact ! Qui imposera sa volonté ? Mihawk ou Zoro ?
Zoro e la forza di volontà
Разговор с великим мечником Михоуком! Смертельная битва Зоро!
لقاء! السّيّاف العظيم ميهوك، صراع زورو المميت العنيد
接触! 大剣豪ミホーク ゾロ意地の死闘
